sage.renderer

Class RenderContext<ContextHolder>

  • java.lang.Object
    • sage.renderer.RenderContext<ContextHolder>

  • public class RenderContext<ContextHolder>
extends java.lang.Object
    This class holds the states of a rendering context. Two separate sets of states are held: the current states, which are applied by the IRenderer implementation to which this RenderContext is attached, and a record of the previous states of this RenderContext object.
    Author:
    John Clevenger, modeled after a similar class in JMonkeyEngine

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clearCurrentState(RenderState.RenderStateType stateType)
      Clears the specified state in this RenderContext.
      void clearCurrentStates()
      Sets all current states to null, and therefore forces the use of the default states.
      ContextHolder getContextHolder() 
      RenderState getCurrentState(RenderState.RenderStateType stateType)
      Returns the specified RenderState of this RenderContext.
      RenderStateRecord getStateRecord(RenderState.RenderStateType type)
      Returns the RenderStateRecord of the given RenderState.RenderStateType from this RenderContext.
      void initRenderStateRecords(IRenderer r)
      Initializes the render state records of this RenderContext.
      void invalidateStates()
      Marks all saved render states of this RenderContext invalid and sets the current render state values of this RenderContext to null.
      void setContextHolder(ContextHolder contextHolder) 
      void setCurrentState(RenderState.RenderStateType type, RenderState state)
      Assigns the specified RenderState as the current state for the specified RenderState.RenderStateType in this RenderContext.

      • invalidateStates

        public void invalidateStates()
        Marks all saved render states of this RenderContext invalid and sets the current render state values of this RenderContext to null.

      • getStateRecord

        public RenderStateRecord getStateRecord(RenderState.RenderStateType type)
        Returns the RenderStateRecord of the given RenderState.RenderStateType from this RenderContext.
        Parameters:
        type - RenderState.RenderStateType
        Returns:
        the RenderStateRecord for the specified RenderStateType

      • clearCurrentStates

        public void clearCurrentStates()
        Sets all current states to null, and therefore forces the use of the default states.

      • clearCurrentState

        public void clearCurrentState(RenderState.RenderStateType stateType)
        Clears the specified state in this RenderContext. The state is referenced by its RenderState.RenderStateType value.
        Parameters:
        stateType - - the type whose state is to be cleared.

      • getCurrentState

        public RenderState getCurrentState(RenderState.RenderStateType stateType)
        Returns the specified RenderState of this RenderContext.
        Parameters:
        stateType - - the RenderState.RenderStateType to return
        Returns:
        - the current RenderState for the specified type

      • setCurrentState

        public void setCurrentState(RenderState.RenderStateType type,
                            RenderState state)
        Assigns the specified RenderState as the current state for the specified RenderState.RenderStateType in this RenderContext.
        Parameters:
        type - - the type of state to be updated
        state - - the new state for this RenderContext
